title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
Hello friends, first of all, I hope you have a good day.

I need help with a MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A that stays at a consumption of 0.444A to 0.464A, the fan spins at maximum speed I don't know much about how to repair macbook I'm new but what I have measured the main lines are present, SMC_RESET_L is present.
I checked the entire board and it has no sulfate water damage etc. only
There seems to be damage to some coils:
L1290
L1275
L1295
L1270

and in the TestPoint
CPU_THRMTRIP_3V3

Also the ssd hard drive gets very hot.

I hope you can help me

This text was translated with google translator, since my English is somewhat bad.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Do you have voltage at L7310/20?
Also check PLT_RESET_L, if present.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
yes, 1.8V on both L7310/20

PLT_RESET_L = 3.3volt --> ohms 150k --> Diode 0.538V

u2071 looks a bit weird

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Check PLT_RST_BUF_L.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Check PLT_RST_BUF_L.
Diode: 0.632v
ohms: 100k
voltage: 3.32v

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Then U2071 is good.

Try known good BIOS.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: ok, entonces vuelvo a montar bios, en esta pagina hay algun tutorial?

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: ok, then I go back to mount bios, on this page is there a tutorial?

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
I suppose you don't have Medusa programmer, or any other tool to do this onboard.
Then you need to remove the SPI chip (U6100) and flash it using an USB programmer; CH341, TL866, EZP2019, RT809, etc.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: puedo obtener medusa pro 1 y tengo programador usb ch341

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Medusa helps a lot; don't need to remove the SPI chip.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
I already reprogrammed the bios, it keeps doing the same thing, now I put another ic from another computer, same part number, I reprogrammed the bios, and it keeps doing the same error, without image, backlight and sound

I reprogrammed it with the ch341 and after programming, I read the information again and it seemed correct.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Just in case, did you check for USB activity?
Test it on both ports.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Yes, I already tried it, I have the power z tester and with that I tried it in both. there is no activity in any

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: yes, it has 5v on each port

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
I asked about activity, not power...
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: ok, then I review and follow the steps of this post

message: I'm sorry friend, something very important happened to me, the equipment does not work its ssd hard drive, since it gets very hot, it seems to be short

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
I don't understand what you wanted to say.

Si te viene mejor, usa español y explica bien el problema actual.
No mezcles informacion de otros hilos...

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Lo siento amigo, me puse a investigar para solucionar el problema, siguiendo la guía que me recomendaste medí señales de pchs rtc, estas son las líneas que medí
RTC_RESET_L = 3.3V
PCH_SRTCRST_L = 3.3V
PCH_INTRUDER_L = 2.9V
PCH_INTVRMEN = 3.0

probé haciendo todo lo que dice el post pero sigue con el mismo problema, el ventilador gira a full, te comentaba que el disco duro que traía calentaba demasiado, tanto que quemaba al tacto

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
El post mencionado es una coleccion de consejos.
Solamente deberias aplicar lo de la comprobacion de actividad USB en tu caso!

Entonces, puedes confirmar que tengas actividad USB???
Tener 5V en salida USB, no es una señal que la placa este "viva".

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Perfecto amigo, acabo de probar en ambos puertos y no prende el led de mi USB, al conectarlo a mi computadora de uso si enciende el led, pero al conectarlo al MacBook que estamos diagnosticando no enciende el led, en ninguno de los dos puertos

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Revisa que tengas todas las tensiones de la pag 11.

Tambien comprueba todos los resistores SPI Bus Series Termination y sus pistas (pag 46).
Limpia J6100, si notas corrosion.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
SPI_ALT_CLK = 3.2v al inicio pero baja a 0v
SPI_ALT_IO0_MOSI = 3.2 al inicio pero  0v
 las otras lineas si mantienen 3.2v  = SPI_ALT_IO1_MISO,  SPI_ALT_IO2_WP_L,  SPI_ALT_IO3_HOLD_L,  SPI_ALT_CS_L

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Queria decir que midas valor (ohm) de cada resistor y compruebas la continuidad de todas las pistas...

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
revise todas las lineas de lapagina 11 y a mi parecer estan todas, ahorita mismo compruebo las lineas del j6100
PP3V3_S5 = 3.3v
PP3V3_SUS = 3.3v
PP3V3_S0 = 3.3v
PP1V5_S0SW_AUDIO_HDA = 1.5v
PP1V05_S0 = 1.05v
PP1V05_S0SW_PCH_HSIO = 1.046
PP1V05_S0_PCH_VCCACLKPLL_R -- L1270 = 1.04 en ambos lados 
PP1V05_S0_PCH_VCC_ICC_R -- L1275 = 1.04 en ambos lados
PP1V05_S0_PCH_VCCAPLL_OPI = 1.05v
PP1V05_S0SW_PCH_HSIO -- L1290 = 1.04v
PP1V05_S0SW_PCH_HSIO -- L1295 = 1.04v

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Este es el valor en ohms y diodo de esas lineas medidas en j6100
SPI_ALT_CLK = 257k = 0.590v
SPI_ALT_CS_L = 1.275M = 0.632v
SPI_ALT_IO0_MOSI = 1.500M = 0.613v
SPI_ALT_IO1_MISO = 1.150M = 0.581v
SPI_ALT_IO2_WP_L = 21.17k = 0.634v
SPI_ALT_IO3_HOLD_L = 21.17k = 0.639v

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
revise y si hay si hay continuidad en las lineas.

SPI_ALT_CLK = 257k = 0.590v
SPI_ALT_CS_L = 1.275M = 0.632v
SPI_ALT_IO0_MOSI = 1.500M = 0.613v
SPI_ALT_IO1_MISO = 1.150M = 0.581v
SPI_ALT_IO2_WP_L = 21.17k = 0.634v
SPI_ALT_IO3_HOLD_L = 21.17k = 0.639v

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Revise y si hay continuidad en las lineas, segui cada una, y estos don los valores que me dieron en ohms y en diodo medi en j6100
SPI_ALT_CLK = 257k = 0.590v
SPI_ALT_CS_L = 1.275M = 0.632v
SPI_ALT_IO0_MOSI = 1.500M = 0.613v
SPI_ALT_IO1_MISO = 1.150M = 0.581v
SPI_ALT_IO2_WP_L = 21.17k = 0.634v
SPI_ALT_IO3_HOLD_L = 21.17k = 0.639v

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
No me has entendido :(.
Los resistores mencionados son de 15, 25 y 43 ohmios; esperemos que ninguno este abierto.
Despues, debes revisar todas las pistas entre esos resistores y U6100 ; que no son pocas!
O sea que debes revisar la continuidad de un resistor a otro, segun el esquema.

Por cierto, revisa tambien los pads y pistas de U6101.

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: disculpa eso no lo comente pero si lo hice y estan bien todas las resistencias si acaso su valor varia por .1 y en todas hay continuidad, de un extremo de pista a otro

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: Entonces, solo queda un problema interno de PCH/CPU...

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message: ahi seria hacer reballin o reemplazarlo cierto ?

title: MacBook Air a1466 820-00165-A Without Picture, Backlight and Sound
message:
Reballing es cosa de leyenda; puede durar 1 año, o 1 horas.
Igual no ayude en absoluto; como un masaje a una pierna de madera...
